caller_intent: Tony is following up on an email from Janelle to adjust the ITV calculation for a limited-service hotel and discuss adding specific coverages (equipment breakdown, hired non-owned auto liability, and property expansion) to the insurance quote.
resolution_steps: Rick confirms he is reviewing the file and acknowledges the need to adjust the ITV from the original full-service hotel calculation.
Tony requests adding optional coverages and confirms they are not already included in the proposal.
Rick agrees to adjust the ITV to a more accurate level for a limited-service property and offset the cost.
They discuss potential competition from Erie and acknowledge the challenging market for mid-scale hotels.
Rick agrees to relay the discussion to Janelle on the underwriting team and set a timeline for next week.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance terminology (ITV, coverage types, underwriting processes)
Knowledge of hotel insurance market dynamics (limited-service vs. full-service properties, competitor pricing)
Familiarity with carrier-specific offerings (e.g., Excel's property expansion coverage)
summary: Rick and Tony discuss adjusting an insurance quote for a limited-service hotel, recalculating ITV, adding coverages, and addressing market competitiveness. The agent will relay the details to the underwriting team with a next-week timeline for resolution.
